children.value: make sure there is a space after the - so that the TOC is generated

su - db2inst1
db2 create database umsdb automatic storage yes using codeset UTF-8 territory US pagesize 32768;
db2 connect to umsdb
db2 list applications
exit
Create the UMS and database secrets
template file in your working directory and update it as needed. In particular, update the user and password for the DB2 database. You may want to also change UMS admin user name and password.
To update the operator configuration, copy this
template file in your working directory and update it as needed. You can highlight the UMS configuration sections that need your attention by doing a diff with the base template file found in
